CustomField.description: Holds the role name, which is populated by a trigger when you use the Set Role lookup. Should be used in reporting on Booking by role, and displaying in the user interface, in lieu of the Set Role lookup.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Holds the role name, which is populated by a trigger when you use the Set Role lookup. Should be used in reporting on Booking by role, and displaying in the user interface, in lieu of the Set Role lookup.
CustomField.label: Role Name
